# ![Bitcoin Graphic](https://lunarcrush.com/gi/w:26/t:bitcoin.png) Bitcoin (BTC)

Bitcoin is nearing a record high, driven by optimism and increased adoption. Major investors and companies, such as MicroStrategy, are continuing to buy and hold large amounts of Bitcoin. The cryptocurrency market is also seeing increased institutional control and potential regulatory changes, including the possibility of Bitcoin being included in 401k plans.

### About Bitcoin
Bitcoin (BTC) is a decentralized digital currency operating on a peer-to-peer network.  
Bitcoin uses the ticker $BTC for trading. Listed in the [Cryptocurrencies](/list/cryptocurrencies) and  category within the [Layer 1](/list/cryptocurrencies/layer-1), [Bitcoin Ecosystem](/list/cryptocurrencies/bitcoin-ecosystem) and [Proof of Work (PoW)](/list/cryptocurrencies/pow) sectors.

- Bitcoin (BTC) social dominance is up 91.40% from the previous 3 months.
- Bitcoin (BTC) posts created is up 12.90% from the previous week.
